name: 吴可嘉
introduction: Grace Wu, also known as Wu Kejia is from China and lives in Singapore and China. She used to work in IT industry and after obtaining her MBA degree from INSEAD business school , she set out to become an entrepreneur in energy sector. During Covid, she started to learn filmmaking and shot her short film Salvation in 2021. After that, Grace went on to write and direct her first feature film Seven Days in 2022. Seven Days is selected as the opening film of the 11th Singapore Chinese Film Festival and Grace becomes the first Chinese director to shoot a Singapore film.
